title: Son of a Boy Dad: Ep. 21 - Happiness is for Good Boys
description:
-- The fellas break down Lil Sas' first stand-up show, M. Night Shyamalan's Unbreakable trilogy, and the true crime phenomenon, & we dip our toes in televangelism and prank phone calls -- Son of a Boy Dad LIVE shows: NYC (10/13) & Boston (11/3)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/sonofaboydad
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
